roleset.name: absence of joining into a whole
roleset.note: NONUNIFICATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'unify.01'. (from nonunification.01-n)

roles.note: Arg4 exists because of the way the verb's arg1 is able to be split up with nominal usage. It isn't expected as its own constituent with verbal rels. (from nonunification.01-n)

role.descr: specific aspect of args1/2 being unified (if in addition)

example.name: no args
example.text: Of course , since social reform and opening up , the mystery of the amazing achievement of the archives gradually faded out of people 's sight ; even for many people , both existing and non-existing are okay , and both keeping and not keeping of archives are okay .
